data.title: Hrvatska Radio Televizija
data.text:
Croatian Radio and Television (HRT) is a public broadcaster in Croatia. It operates several radio and television channels over a domestic transmitter network as well as satellite. Croatian Radio and Television has 3 national and 8 regional radio stations, 8 regional centers and 4 terrestrial televisions.

x-dream-media has supplied an integration module for Signiant Manager + Agents to connect Signiant Media Exchange and Harmonic WFS for transcoding, plus Woody Check-In for supplying source footage to Avid Interplay PAM.
